pkgmetadata.longdescription: Methods for Smart Meter Data Analysis // Methods for analysis of energy consumption data (electricity, gas, water) at different data measurement intervals. The package provides feature extraction methods and algorithms to prepare data for data mining and machine learning applications. Deatiled descriptions of the methods and their application can be found in Hopf (2019, ISBN:978-3-86309-669-4) "Predictive Analytics for Energy Efficiency and Energy Retailing" doi:10.20378/irbo-54833 and Hopf et al. (2016) doi:10.1007/s12525-018-0290-9 "Enhancing energy efficiency in the residential sector with smart meter data analytics".
